name: Parasite Pals
description:
You are two friends who escaped from a super secret facility. You found yourselves in a small town, hungry for blood.

  • W, A, S, D to Move.
  • E, Q to Strafe left and right.
  • Shift to Sprint.
  • Space for focus mode.

Get close to humans so your pal can eat. Eating soldiers and humans gives you 1 Max Health.

Staying hidden (out of combat), for a small amount of time, generates health.

*You can climb everywhere.

Made for Kajam 2021 in less than 7 Days. 

Music by: https://timbeek.itch.io
